name: Meows On Wheels
description:
Premise

You are not in control of the vehicle! And the wheels are out of control and all over the places! The worst part is an adorable cat is stuck inside and he really wants to get home!

Try attaching the wheels to different objects in the world to try and take back the control in this crazy world. (And also bring the cat home)

“Controls”
You cannot control the vehicle but you are equipped with a floating hand that lets you pick the wheel up, move it around to attach them to different objects.

Made By

KP K. , Ramon J. and Harvey Upton
